events.name: Policy objectives of the IRA tax credits
events.wd_label: Policy objectives of the IRA tax credits
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) includes consumer tax credits and aims to achieve broader objectives, addressing the pre-IRA economic and policy equilibrium and making the green energy transition sustainable against political reversals.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) includes consumer tax credits and aims to achieve broader objectives, addressing the pre-IRA economic and policy equilibrium and making the green energy transition sustainable against political reversals.

events.name: Consumer tax credits
events.wd_description: The IRA includes provisions for consumer tax credits to incentivize the adoption of green energy.
events.description: The IRA includes provisions for consumer tax credits to incentivize the adoption of green energy.

events.name: Addressing pre-IRA equilibrium
events.wd_description: The US government perceived the pre-IRA economic and policy equilibrium as dominated by China, requiring a strategic shift to counteract this dominance.
events.description: The US government perceived the pre-IRA economic and policy equilibrium as dominated by China, requiring a strategic shift to counteract this dominance.

events.name: Sustainable policy transition
events.wd_description: The IRA aims to make the green energy transition sustainable and prevent political reversals similar to the US withdrawal from the Paris Agreement in 2017.
events.description: The IRA aims to make the green energy transition sustainable and prevent political reversals similar to the US withdrawal from the Paris Agreement in 2017.

events.name: Impact on the US ICE automobile industry and at-risk jobs
events.wd_label: Impact on the US ICE automobile industry and at-risk jobs
events.wd_description: The transition from ICE vehicles to EVs poses a risk to hundreds of thousands of jobs in the US, particularly in politically important swing states like Michigan and Ohio, affecting communities that have suffered significant economic losses since 2001.
events.description: The transition from ICE vehicles to EVs poses a risk to hundreds of thousands of jobs in the US, particularly in politically important swing states like Michigan and Ohio, affecting communities that have suffered significant economic losses since 2001.

events.name: ICE to EV transition
events.wd_description: The transition from internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles to electric vehicles (EVs) involves different corporate players and inputs.
events.description: The transition from internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles to electric vehicles (EVs) involves different corporate players and inputs.

events.name: At-risk jobs
events.wd_description: The transition puts hundreds of thousands of jobs at risk, particularly in the ICE automobile industry.
events.description: The transition puts hundreds of thousands of jobs at risk, particularly in the ICE automobile industry.

events.name: Impact on swing states
events.wd_description: Many of the at-risk jobs are in politically important swing states like Michigan and Ohio, affecting communities that have experienced large economic losses since 2001.
events.description: Many of the at-risk jobs are in politically important swing states like Michigan and Ohio, affecting communities that have experienced large economic losses since 2001.

events.name: US perception of China's dominance in the pre-IRA equilibrium
events.wd_label: US perception of China's dominance in the pre-IRA equilibrium
events.wd_description: The US perceived the pre-IRA equilibrium as dominated by China, which subsidized EVs and prioritized the sector as part of its "Made in China 2025" industrial policy, discriminating in favor of indigenous firms and imposing high import tariffs.
events.description: The US perceived the pre-IRA equilibrium as dominated by China, which subsidized EVs and prioritized the sector as part of its "Made in China 2025" industrial policy, discriminating in favor of indigenous firms and imposing high import tariffs.

events.name: China's EV subsidies
events.wd_description: China subsidized EVs as part of its strategy to dominate the sector.
events.description: China subsidized EVs as part of its strategy to dominate the sector.

events.name: Made in China 2025
events.wd_description: The "Made in China 2025" industrial policy prioritized the EV sector and aimed to boost domestic production.
events.description: The "Made in China 2025" industrial policy prioritized the EV sector and aimed to boost domestic production.

events.name: Discriminatory policies
events.wd_description: China's supply-side policies for batteries were alleged to discriminate in favor of indigenous firms.
events.description: China's supply-side policies for batteries were alleged to discriminate in favor of indigenous firms.

events.name: High import tariffs
events.wd_description: China's high import tariffs protected local firms from foreign competition.
events.description: China's high import tariffs protected local firms from foreign competition.
